body_html: @andrewharp thank you, I hope I will have time to take a look at it. I remember I have also tried to decompose ELU as a sum of ReLU and masked exp(input) - 1 , still produced the same results, so I think the problem comes from the exp function on quantized values.
body_text: @andrewharp thank you, I hope I will have time to take a look at it. I remember I have also tried to decompose ELU as a sum of ReLU and masked exp(input) - 1 , still produced the same results, so I think the problem comes from the exp function on quantized values.
body: @andrewharp thank you, I hope I will have time to take a look at it. I remember I have also tried to decompose ELU as a sum of ReLU and masked exp(input) - 1 , still produced the same results, so I think the problem comes from the exp function on quantized values.
